extension.summary: openvpn: a full featured SSL VPN software solution that integrates OpenVPN server capabilities. (XvBMC: fix dependencies mismatch).
extension.description: openvpn binary is installed as /storage/.kodi/addons/network.openvpn/bin/openvpn (XvBMC: replace *v6.0.1* / fix dependencies not met).
extension.disclaimer: this is an unofficial addon. please don't ask for support in openelec forum / irc channel (XvBMC: replace previous 6.0.0-to-6.0.1 bump).
